page.title: 10Bretton Country Park.
page.content: On Wednesday 8th May eight of us went to Bretton Park.We went in two cars and followed a map.At Bretton Park we met the warden and went into the Information Centre. We looked at the stuffed animals and the warden told us about them. Then we went on the nature trail, following the yellow arrows.The first thing we saw was a grey squirrel running across the path. It had a baby in it's mouth. Then we saw a tree with metal pieces in it.There were cows in a field and cattle pen at the side of the track. I could not stop looking through the binoculars and I think I spotted an old mine shaft in the distance. Before we came to the end of the trail we saw an old chapel.
